page.title: 03ST. GEORGES LOWER SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is a lower school. It is quite a big school. It has eight classrooms. It has seven classes and a spare classroom where we do music and keep things that everyone shares. We have got a computer at school and each class takes it in turn to have it and we play lots of nice games on it. We have a headmaster. All the other teachers are ladies. We start lessons at 9 o'clock. We sing first in assembly and then we do work. We do very nice things in our classes. Most people like physical education best. We have a playtime in the morning and the afternoon and a lunch hour. Most people stay to school dinners or eat sandwichs at school. We have a library and we have librarians who look after it. They are chosen from children in class 6. We learn maths and timetables. We have a swimming pool.
